item.title: The most wonderful time of the year
item.author: Thea Powell,
item.description: Day the First: The Day We Didn’t Sleep On a chilly Winter day (Friday the 17th of December to be precise), thirteen Fellwanderers gathered for the Lake District Winter Tour, blissfully unaware of the epic three days that awaited them. It didn’t take long for things to start going wrong. Our intrepid …
